summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TheSyncBridge platform with new admin and store features. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly including admin login, transmission management, merchandise store with Scroll ID verification, and order processing.
passed_tests: Admin login at /admin with password 'syncbridge325' works correctly
Admin dashboard loads with transmissions and orders tabs
Admin can add transmissions with day number, title, description, and video URL
Admin can delete transmissions from dashboard
Store page requires Scroll ID verification before showing products
Store displays all 3 products: hoodie ($65), shirt ($35), hat ($30) with personalized previews
Cart functionality works with size selection for hoodie/shirt and no size for hat
Checkout form collects shipping information correctly
Order submission creates order in database with proper total calculation
Orders appear in admin dashboard for management
Transmissions with video URLs show watch links on public transmissions page
Mission clock displays Day 0/325 correctly across all pages
Navigation between all pages works seamlessly
Guardian registration generates unique Scroll IDs (SB-0008 created during testing)
All backend API endpoints respond with correct status codes (15/15 tests passed)
Frontend-backend integration working perfectly for all new features
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (15/15 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all features tested successfully)
